java/liquibase/change/ModifyColumnChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.ReorganizeTableStatement;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00010 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00011 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00013 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00014 
00015 import java.util.ArrayList;
00016 import java.util.HashSet;
00017 import java.util.List;
00018 import java.util.Set;
00019 
00023 public class ModifyColumnChange extends AbstractChange {
00024 
00025     private String schemaName;
00026     private String tableName;
00027     private List<ColumnConfig> columns;
00028 
00029     public ModifyColumnChange() {
00030         super("modifyColumn", "Modify Column");
00031         columns = new ArrayList<ColumnConfig>();
00032     }
00033 
00034     public String getSchemaName() {
00035         return schemaName;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00039         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public String getTableName() {
00043         return tableName;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00047         this.tableName = tableName;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public List<ColumnConfig> getColumns() {
00051                 return columns;
00052     }
00053 
00054     public void addColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00055         columns.add(column);
00056     }
00057 
00058     public void removeColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00059         columns.remove(column);
00060     }
00061 
00062     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00063         List<SqlStatement> sql = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00064 
00065       for (ColumnConfig aColumn : columns) {
00066 
00067           String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName();
00068           if(database instanceof SybaseDatabase) {
00069                         sql.add(new RawSqlStatement("ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(schemaName, getTableName()) + " MODIFY " + aColumn.getName() + " " + aColumn.getType()));
00070         } else if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00071                         sql.add(new RawSqlStatement("ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(schemaName, getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN " + aColumn.getName() + " " + aColumn.getType()));
00072         } else if (database instanceof MySQLDatabase) {
00073                         sql.add(new RawSqlStatement("ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(schemaName, getTableName()) + " MODIFY COLUMN " + aColumn.getName() + " " + aColumn.getType()));
00074         } else if (database instanceof OracleDatabase || database instanceof MaxDBDatabase) {
00075                         sql.add(new RawSqlStatement("ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(schemaName, getTableName()) + " MODIFY (" + aColumn.getName() + " " + aColumn.getType() + ")"));
00076         } else if (database instanceof DerbyDatabase) {
00077                         sql.add(new RawSqlStatement("ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(schemaName, getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN "+aColumn.getName()+" SET DATA TYPE " + aColumn.getType()));
00078         } else if (database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00079                         sql.add(new RawSqlStatement("ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(schemaName, getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN "+aColumn.getName()+" "+aColumn.getType()));
00080         } else if (database instanceof CacheDatabase) {
00081                         sql.add(new RawSqlStatement("ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(schemaName, getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN " + aColumn.getName() + " " + aColumn.getType()));
00082         } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00083                         sql.add(new RawSqlStatement("ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(schemaName, getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN " + aColumn.getName() + " SET DATA TYPE " + aColumn.getType()));
00084                         sql.add(new ReorganizeTableStatement(schemaName, getTableName()));
00085         } else {
00086                         sql.add(new RawSqlStatement("ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(schemaName, getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN " + aColumn.getName() + " TYPE " + aColumn.getType()));
00087         }
00088       }
00089         
00090       return sql.toArray(new SqlStatement[sql.size()]);
00091     }
00092 
00093     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00094                 List<String> names = new ArrayList<String>(columns.size());
00095                 for (ColumnConfig col : columns) {
00096                 names.add(col.getName() + "(" + col.getType() + ")");
00097                 }
00098 
00099         return "Columns " + StringUtils.join(names, ",") + " of " + getTableName() + " modified";
00100     }
00101 
00102     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00103         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("modifyColumn");
00104         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00105             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00106         }        
00107         node.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00108         
00109         for (ColumnConfig col : getColumns()) {
00110           Element subNode = col.createNode(currentChangeLogFileDOM);
00111           node.appendChild(subNode);
00112         }
00113 
00114         return node;
00115     }
00116 
00117     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00118       List<DatabaseObject> result = new ArrayList<DatabaseObject>(columns.size());
00119 
00120       Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00121       for (ColumnConfig aColumn : columns) {
00122           Column each = new Column();
00123           each.setTable(table);
00124           each.setName(aColumn.getName());
00125           result.add(each);
00126       }
00127 
00128       return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(result);
00129     }
00130 
00131 }
